name: Samuel L. Jackson
bio: American actor known for roles in 'Pulp Fiction' and the Marvel Cinematic Universe. One of the highest-grossing actors of all time.

name: Scarlett Johansson
bio: Award-winning American actress best known for playing Black Widow in the MCU.

name: Robert Downey Jr.
bio: Iconic actor famous for his role as Tony Stark / Iron Man in Marvel films.

name: Zoe Saldana
bio: American actress known for her roles in 'Avatar' and 'Guardians of the Galaxy'.

name: Chris Pratt
bio: Starred in 'Guardians of the Galaxy' and 'Jurassic World'.

name: Chris Hemsworth
bio: Australian actor known for playing Thor in the Marvel Universe.

name: Tom Cruise
bio: Hollywood icon, known for 'Mission: Impossible' and 'Top Gun'.

name: Vin Diesel
bio: Famous for his role as Dominic Toretto in the 'Fast & Furious' franchise.

name: Dwayne Johnson
bio: Actor and former pro wrestler, starred in 'Jumanji' and 'Fast & Furious'.

name: Leonardo DiCaprio
bio: Oscar-winning actor known for 'Titanic', 'Inception', and 'The Revenant'.

name: Brad Pitt
bio: Star of 'Fight Club', 'World War Z', and 'Once Upon a Time in Hollywood'.

name: Angelina Jolie
bio: Actress and humanitarian, known for 'Maleficent' and 'Tomb Raider'.

name: Johnny Depp
bio: Famous for his role as Captain Jack Sparrow in 'Pirates of the Caribbean'.

name: Tom Hanks
bio: Legendary actor known for 'Forrest Gump', 'Cast Away', and 'Saving Private Ryan'.

name: Morgan Freeman
bio: Acclaimed actor with iconic roles in 'The Shawshank Redemption' and more.

name: Matt Damon
bio: Known for 'The Martian', 'Bourne' series, and 'Good Will Hunting'.

name: Christian Bale
bio: British actor who portrayed Batman in 'The Dark Knight' trilogy.

name: Michael Caine
bio: British film icon known for roles in 'The Dark Knight' and 'Inception'.

name: Peyton List
bio: American actress featured in 'Cobra Kai' and 'The Friendship Game'.

name: Ezra Miller
bio: Starred as The Flash in the DC Extended Universe.

name: Keanu Reeves
bio: Canadian actor best known for his roles in 'The Matrix' and 'John Wick' franchises.

name: Emma Watson
bio: British actress famous for portraying Hermione Granger in the 'Harry Potter' series.

name: Will Smith
bio: American actor and rapper known for 'Men in Black', 'The Pursuit of Happyness', and 'King Richard'.

name: Natalie Portman
bio: Academy Award-winning actress known for 'Black Swan', 'V for Vendetta', and the 'Thor' films.
